snippet: The Equity Office Properties Trust, the largest owner of office properties in the United States, bought the Palo Alto Square office complex in the Silicon Valley of California for $85 million from a partnership controlled by Sam Zell, the billiona...
lead_paragraph: The Equity Office Properties Trust, the largest owner of office properties in the United States, bought the Palo Alto Square office complex in the Silicon Valley of California for $85 million from a partnership controlled by Sam Zell, the billionaire financier who is chairman of Equity Office. The Chicago-based real estate investment trust said the complex near Stanford University had 320,500 square feet of space and was fully occupied. Equity Office and its predecessors have managed the five-building complex for 20 years.
